name: Huzursuz Beyin
description:
"Daha huzurlu ve akıllı bir yaşam sürebilmek için psikoloji ve felsefe ile ilgili okumalar yapıyor, notlar alıyor ve bunları başta Instagram üzere çeşitli platformlardan okuyucularımla paylaşıyorum."
-Huzursuz Beyin

name: PhET
description: Founded in 2002 by Nobel Laureate Carl Wieman, the PhET Interactive Simulations project at the University of Colorado Boulder creates free interactive math and science simulations. PhET sims are based on extensive education research and engage students through an intuitive, game-like environment where students learn through exploration and discovery. Also, available at many languages.

name: Refactoring.Guru
description: Refactoring.Guru makes it easy for you to discover everything you need to know about refactoring, design patterns, SOLID principles, and other smart programming topics.
